description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age provided by author in data file
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
trials where the participant was not attentive
repetition of a trial where the participant was not attentive/ _f indicates final trial which was used in analyses
object the experimenter pointed to – all objects were pointed to the same amount
side of the tool box on which object was located
coincidence of direction of pointing gesture and side of tool box the participant opened
indication of whether or not the participant handed the object to the experimenter
